root.title: response body
root.description: Get the full configuration of the workspace

start.description: Whether the user interface is not loaded

cloudRegion.description:
Cloud Service Provider Region
- `0`: Chinese mainland
- `1`: North America

dataIndexState.description:
Data index status
- `0`: Indexed
- `1`: Not indexed

lang.title: TLang
lang.description:
User interface language  
Same as {@link IAppearance.lang}

localIPs.description: A list of the IP addresses of the devices on which the kernel resides

openHelp.description: Whether to open the user guide after startup

readonly.description: Whether it is running in read-only mode

showChangelog.description: Whether to display the changelog for this release version

apiMaxContexts.description: The maximum number of contexts passed when requesting the API

apiMaxTokens.description: Maximum number of tokens (0 means no limit)

apiModel.title: TOpenAIAPIModel
apiModel.description: The model name called by the API

apiTemperature.description: Parameter `temperature` that controls the randomness of the generated text

apiUserAgent.description: API request additional user agent field

closeButtonBehavior.description:
Close button behavior
- `0`: Exit application
- `1`: Minimize to pallets

icon.description: The name of the icon currently in use

iconVer.description: The version number of the icon currently in use

lang.title: TLang
lang.description: The language used by the current user

mode.description:
The current theme mode
- `0`: Light theme
- `1`: Dark theme

modeOS.description: Whether the theme mode follows the system theme

themeDark.description: The name of the dark theme currently in use

themeJS.description: Whether the current theme has enabled theme JavaScript

themeLight.description: The name of the light theme currently in use

themeVer.description: The version number of the theme currently in use

trust.description: Whether to trust (enable) the resources for the bazaar

allowHTMLBLockScript.description: Allow HTML blocks to run scripts

backlinkExpandCount.description: The default number of backlinks to expand

backmentionExpandCount.description: The default number of backlinks to mention

blockRefDynamicAnchorTextMaxLen.description: The maximum length of the dynamic anchor text for block references

codeLigatures.description: Whether the code block has enabled ligatures

codeLineWrap.description: Whether the code block is automatically wrapped

codeSyntaxHighlightLineNum.description: Whether the code block displays line numbers

codeTabSpaces.description: The number of spaces generated by the Tab key in the code block, configured as 0 means no conversion to spaces

displayBookmarkIcon.description: Whether to display the bookmark icon

displayNetImgMark.description: Whether to display the network image mark

dynamicLoadBlocks.description: The number of blocks loaded each time they are dynamically loaded

embedBlockBreadcrumb.description: Whether the embedded block displays breadcrumbs

floatWindowMode.description:
The trigger mode of the preview window
- `0`: Hover over the cursor
- `1`: Hover over the cursor while holding down Ctrl
- `2`: Do not trigger the floating window

fontFamily.description: The font used in the editor

fontSize.description: The font size used in the editor

fontSizeScrollZoom.description: Whether to enable the use of the mouse wheel to adjust the font size of the editor

fullWidth.description: Whether the editor uses maximum width

generateHistoryInterval.description: The time interval for generating document history, set to 0 to disable document history (unit: minutes)

listItemDotNumberClickFocus.description: Whether to enable single-click list item mark focus

listLogicalOutdent.description: Whether to enable the list logical reverse indentation scheme

onlySearchForDoc.description: Whether to enable the `[[` symbol to search only for document blocks

rtl.description: Whether to enable RTL (left-to-right chirography) mode

virtualBlockRefExclude.description: Virtual reference keyword exclusion list (separated by commas `,`)

virtualBlockRefInclude.description: Virtual reference keyword inclusion list (separated by commas `,`)

inlineMath.description: Whether to enable inline formula syntax `$foo$`

paragraphBeginningSpace.description:
Whether the beginning of the paragraph is empty two spaces.
Insert two full-width spaces `U+3000` at the beginning of the paragraph.

addTitle.description: Add article title (insert the article title as a first-level title at the beginning of the document)

blockRefMode.description:
Content block reference export mode
- `0`: Original text (deprecated)
- `1`: Quotation block (deprecated)
- `2`: Anchor text block link
- `3`: Anchor text only
- `4`: Footnote
- `5`: Anchor hash

blockEmbedMode.description:
Embedded block export mode
- `0`: Original block content
- `1`: Quotation block

blockRefTextLeft.description: The symbol on the left side of the block reference anchor text during export

blockRefTextRight.description: The symbol on the right side of the block reference anchor text during export

fileAnnotationRefMode.description:
File annotation reference export mode
- `0`: File name - page number - anchor text
- `1`: Anchor text only

markdownYFM.description: Whether to add YAML Front Matter when exporting to Markdown

pdfFooter.description: Custom footer content when exporting to PDF

docxTemplate.description: The path of the template file used when exporting to Docx

pdfWatermarkStr.description: The watermark text or watermark file path used when exporting to PDF

pdfWatermarkDesc.description: Custom watermark position, size, style, etc. when exporting to PDF

imageWatermarkStr.description: The watermark text or watermark file path used when exporting to an image

imageWatermarkDesc.description: Custom watermark position, size, style, etc. when exporting to an image

allowCreateDeeper.description: Whether to allow the creation of sub-documents deeper than 7 levels

alwaysSelectOpenedFile.description: Whether to automatically locate the currently open document in the document tree

closeTabsOnStart.description: Whether to close all tabs when starting

docCreateSaveBox.description: The notebook to storage the new document

docCreateSavePath.description: The storage path of the new document

maxListCount.description: The maximum number of documents listed

maxOpenTabCount.description: The maximum number of open tabs

openFilesUseCurrentTab.description: Whether to open the file in the current tab

refCreateSaveBox.description: The notebook to storage the new document created using block references

refCreateSavePath.description: The storage path of the new document created using block references

removeDocWithoutConfirm.description: Close the secondary confirmation when deleting a document

sort.description:
Document sorting method
- `0`: File name ascending
- `1`: File name descending
- `2`: File update time ascending
- `3`: File update time descending
- `4`: File name natural number ascending
- `5`: File name natural number descending
- `6`: Custom sorting
- `7`: Reference count ascending
- `8`: Reference count descending
- `9`: File creation time ascending
- `10`: File creation time descending
- `11`: File size ascending
- `12`: File size descending
- `13`: Sub-document count ascending
- `14`: Sub-document count descending
- `15`: Use document tree sorting rules
- `256`: Unspecified sorting rules, according to the notebook priority over the document tree to obtain sorting rules

useSingleLineSave.description: Whether to save the content of the .sy file as a single-line JSON object

deck.description: Whether to enable deck card making

heading.description: Whether to enable heading block card making

list.description: Whether to enable list block card making

mark.description: Whether to enable mark element card making

reviewMode.description:
Review mode
- `0`: New and old mixed
- `1`: New card priority
- `2`: Old card priority

superBlock.description: Whether to enable super block card making

maxBlocks.description: Maximum number of content blocks displayed

dailyNote.description: Whether to display nodes in daily notes

minRefs.description: The minimum number of references to the displayed node

dailyNote.description: Whether to display nodes in daily notes

enable.description: Whether to enable the publishing service

port.description: The port used by the publishing service

publish_auth.title: IPublishAuth
publish_auth.description: Publish service basic auth related configuration

accounts.description: Publish service Basic authentication username/password list

enable.description: Whether to enable publishing service basic authentication

syncIndexTiming.description: Synchronous index timing, if it exceeds this time, the user is prompted that the index performance is degraded (unit: milliseconds)

alias.description: Whether to search in block aliases

audioBlock.description: Whether to search in audio blocks

backlinkMentionAlias.description: Extract backlink mention keywords from block aliases

backlinkMentionAnchor.description: Extract backlink mention keywords from block reference anchor text

backlinkMentionDoc.description: Extract backlink mention keywords from document names

backlinkMentionKeywordsLimit.description: Maximum number of backlink mention keywords

backlinkMentionName.description: Extract backlink mention keywords from block names

caseSensitive.description: Whether to distinguish between uppercase and lowercase letters when searching

iframeBlock.description: Whether to search in iframe blocks

indexAssetPath.description: Whether to search resource file paths

videoBlock.description: Whether to search in video blocks

virtualRefAlias.description: Whether to get virtual reference keywords from block aliases

virtualRefAnchor.description: Whether to get virtual reference keywords from block reference anchor text

virtualRefDoc.description: Whether to get virtual reference keywords from document names

virtualRefName.description: Whether to get virtual reference keywords from block names

widgetBlock.description: Whether to search in widget blocks

enabledCSS.description: Whether to enable CSS code snippets

enabledJS.description: Whether to enable JavaScript code snippets

cAssetsSize.description: Size of resource files after chunk encryption (unit: bytes)

cBlockCount.description: Number of content blocks after chunk encryption

cDataSize.description: Size of the data directory after chunk encryption (unit: bytes)

cTreeCount.description: Number of content block trees after chunk encryption (number of documents)

treeCount.description: Number of content block trees (number of documents)

generateConflictDoc.description: Whether to create a conflict document when a conflict occurs during synchronization

mode.description:
Synchronization mode
- `0`: Not set
- `1`: Automatic synchronization
- `2`: Manual synchronization
- `3`: Completely manual synchronization

provider.description:
Cloud storage service provider
- `0`: SiYuan official cloud storage service
- `2`: Object storage service compatible with S3 protocol
- `3`: Network storage service using WebDAV protocol

stat.description: The prompt information of the last synchronization

synced.description: The time of the last synchronization (Unix timestamp)

sync_s3.title: ISyncS3
sync_s3.description: S3 compatible object storage related configuration

appDir.description: The absolute path of the `resources` directory under the SiYuan installation directory

autoLaunch2.description:
Boot automatically mode
- `0`: Close automatically start
- `1`: Auto start
- `2`: Silent auto start

confDir.description: The absolute path of the `conf` directory of the current workspace

container.title: TSystemContainer
container.description:
Kernel operating environment
- `docker`: Docker container
- `android`: Android device
- `ios`: iOS device
- `std`: Desktop Electron environment

dataDir.description: The absolute path of the `data` directory of the current workspace

downloadInstallPkg.description: Whether to automatically download the installation package for the new version

homeDir.description: The absolute path of the user's home directory for the current operating system user

id.description: The UUID of the current session

isInsider.description: Whether the current version is an internal test version

isMicrosoftStore.description: Whether the current version is a Microsoft Store version

lockScreenMode.description:
Lock screen mode
- `0`: Manual
- `1`: Manual + Follow the operating system

name.description: The name of the current device

networkServe.description: Whether to enable network serve (whether to allow connections from other devices)

os.title: TSystemOS
os.description:
The operating system name determined at compile time
(obtained using the command `go tool dist list`)
- `android`: Android
- `darwin`: macOS
- `ios`: iOS
- `linux`: Linux
- `windows`: Windows

workspaceDir.description: The absolute path of the workspace directory

scheme.title: TSystemNetworkProxyScheme
scheme.description:
The protocol used by the proxy server
- Empty String: Use the system proxy settings
- `http`: HTTP
- `https`: HTTPS
- `socks5`: SOCKS5

sort.description:
Tag sorting scheme
- `0`: Name alphabetically ascending
- `1`: Name alphabetically descending
- `4`: Name natural ascending
- `5`: Name natural descending
- `7`: Reference count ascending
- `8`: Reference count descending

direction.title: TUiLayoutDirection
direction.description:
Panel content layout direction
- `tb`: Top and bottom layout
- `lr`: Left and right layout

type.title: TUiLayoutType
type.description:
Layout type
- `normal`: Normal panel
- `center`: Center panel
- `top`: Top panel
- `bottom`: Bottom panel
- `left`: Left panel
- `right`: Right panel

resize.title: TUiLayoutDirection
resize.description:
The direction in which the size can be adjusted
- `tb`: Can adjust the size up and down
- `lr`: Can adjust the size left and right

resize.title: TUiLayoutDirection
resize.description:
The direction in which the size can be adjusted
- `tb`: Can adjust the size up and down
- `lr`: Can adjust the size left and right

action.description: (Editor) Actions to be performed after the tab is loaded

mode.title: TUiLayoutTabEditorMode
mode.description:
(Editor) Editor mode
- `wysiwyg`: WYSIWYG mode
- `preview`: Export preview mode

type.title: TUILayoutTabBacklinkType
type.description:
(Backlink) Tab type
- `pin`: Pinned backlink panel
- `local`: The backlink panel of the current editor

type.title: TUILayoutTabGraphType
type.description:
(Graph) Tab type
- `pin`: Pinned graph
- `local`: Graph of the current editor
- `global`: Global graph

isPreview.description: (Outline) Whether the associated editor is in preview mode

type.title: TUILayoutTabOutlineType
type.description:
(Outline) Tab type
- `pin`: Pinned outline panel
- `local`: The outline panel of the current editor

group.description:
Grouping strategy
- `0`: No grouping
- `1`: Group by document

method.description:
Search scheme
- `0`: Keyword (default)
- `1`: Query syntax
- `2`: SQL
- `3`: Regular expression
@defaultValue 0

name.description: Custom name of the query condition group

removed.description: Whether to clear the search box after removing the currently used query condition group

sort.description:
Search result sorting scheme
- `0`: Block type (default)
- `1`: Ascending by creation time
- `2`: Descending by creation time
- `3`: Ascending by update time
- `4`: Descending by update time
- `5`: By content order (only valid when grouping by document)
- `6`: Ascending by relevance
- `7`: Descending by relevance
@defaultValue 0

audioBlock.description:
Search results contain audio blocks
@defaultValue false

blockquote.description:
Search results contain blockquote blocks
@defaultValue false

codeBlock.description:
Search results contain code blocks
@defaultValue false

databaseBlock.description:
Search results contain database blocks
@defaultValue false

document.description:
Search results contain document blocks
@defaultValue false

embedBlock.description:
Search results contain embed blocks
@defaultValue false

heading.description:
Search results contain heading blocks
@defaultValue false

htmlBlock.description:
Search results contain html blocks
@defaultValue false

iframeBlock.description:
Search results contain iframe blocks
@defaultValue false

list.description:
Search results contain list blocks
@defaultValue false

listItem.description:
Search results contain list item blocks
@defaultValue false

mathBlock.description:
Search results contain math blocks
@defaultValue false

paragraph.description:
Search results contain paragraph blocks
@defaultValue false

superBlock.description:
Search results contain super blocks
@defaultValue false

table.description:
Search results contain table blocks
@defaultValue false

videoBlock.description:
Search results contain video blocks
@defaultValue false

widgetBlock.description:
Search results contain widget blocks
@defaultValue false
